caption.center: STATE OF HAWAI'I, Respondent/Plaintiff-Appellee v. CURTIS P.

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (FC-CR. NO. 06-1-1079)
opinion.attorneys: Mary Ann Barnard, on the application for petitioner/ defendant-appellant.

center.underline: ORDER REJECTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
By: ACOBA, J., for the court.[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Recktenwald, C.J., Nakayama, Acoba, and Duffy, JJ., and Circuit Judge Chan, assigned by reason of a vacancy.
opinion.opinion_text: The Application for Writ of Certiorari filed on September 16, 2010 by Petitioner/Defendant-Appellant Curtis P. Worsham is hereby rejected.Page 1
